group_1.textRight: Here I go! [chara:301000:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:301000:lipSynch_1][flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall][surround:3010A02]Haaah!!!

group_1.narration: Of course, Ria also works diligently to@fulfill her contract as a Magical Girl.
Serious to her core, Ria Ami, a girl with@beauty beyond compare, is not one to@thoughtlessly abandon her responsibilities.

group_1.textRight: Ria Ami is an alluring masterpiece both@inside and out.
(Even her fighting style...)
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][surround:3010A02]Prepare yourself! Hyah!!!
(...is executed with grace and class. And@what's more...)
Everyone, fall back! I'll land the finishing@blow!
(Her style and panache are unparalleled!)
(No matter what field I fight in, I always@take on the leading role.)
Your evil reign stops here!
Here I come! Bella Spiâ€•
[chara:301000:lipSynch_0][chara:301000:lipSynch_1][chara:301000:cheek_0][chara:301000:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:301000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][chara:301000:mouthOpen_1][se:7226_shock]What?!
You!!!
Wow! That was amazing! You really blew@them all away!
You really did! You're a three star@Magical Girl!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100300:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Aw, you guys are gonna make me blush!

group_1.textRight: What's going on? Why's everyone making@such a big deal out of that?!
Now you listen to me! I was biding my time@for the final moment.
I held back my finishing move for that@very reason.
If I'd only managed to use it in time!
Then all of you would have seen a sight@really worth losing your minds over!

group_1.textLeft: It's not like it makes any difference, right?@The Witch is still gone.

group_1.textRight: What?! It totally makes a difference!
The finishing move is the main event!
But SOMEONE ran in and swiped it away,@and everyone's all "whoo, cool, thanks!"
How the heck am I supposed to just smile@and let that go?! I won't!

group_1.textLeft: You really have to get your way all the@time, don't you...

group_1.textRight: [chara:301000:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]And YOU!
When someone explicitly says, "I'll land@the finishing blow!" in battle...
Listen and take it as a warning! At least@try to read the situation!

group_1.textLeft: I-I didn't realize it was that big a deal.

group_1.textRight: Ugh! I'm just SO mad!

group_1.textLeft: Do you want to come by my place and have@a rice omelet?

group_1.textRight: Hmph! ...Yes! An extra large serving, please!
